Author: Alexbt
Title: [ANN][PRE SALE] ZNAQ: First crypto index traded as a token! 3200% last year!

We will complete the development of ZNAQ Exchange to its full functionality and will trade ZNAQ Index as an actual product. The expected date of product launch is September 2018. https://twitter.com/znaqindex/status/1018779556277374977

Author: ZNAQ Index
Title: [ANN][PRE SALE] ZNAQ: First crypto index traded as a token! 3200% last year!
Body: Any exchange where ZNAQ Tokens will be traded, will have to accept ZNAQ Tokens Terms of Trading, hence they will have no right to place the orders above or below the index price. Such orders will simply not pass the security algorithm.

Author: ekaafi
Title: [ANN][PRE SALE] ZNAQ: First crypto index traded as a token! 3200% last year!
Body: ZNAQ Cryptex is the way to benefit from the cryptocurrency market dynamics. Cryptex allows users to trade different cryptocurrency pairs, indices, and other trading products, hence make additional profits on market shifts. Cryptex offers several of its trading products in the form of a Futures Contract, which can be traded by users with a leverage of up. ZNAQ Analytics is a reliable resource for the analysis of the cryptocurrency market. Here you will find technical analysis, forecasts and reports, community discussion rooms and a unique platform for assembling and analyzing multi currency portfolios.

Author: ICOEthics
Title: [ANN][PRE SALE] ZNAQ: First crypto index traded as a token! 3200% last year!
Body: Hello ZNAQ TEAM  As you should be aware, there are pyramid schemes created by big Telegram’s Airdrop & Bounty advertiser AFFECTING the crypto community.  We are ICOEthics and our mission is to investigate claims and/or abnormalities against people or companies that are creating Fake ICOs and scamming the crypto-community.  We do follow leads to investigate and we also perform independent investigations based on listed ICOs/Tokens on diverse web sites.  Our investigation is at our own cost to help protect the crypto community, and we do not accept payments from third parties to investigate any ICOs/Tokens.  We are sorry to inform you that we found some abnormalities on your ICO/Tokens, and we would like to ask you to provide an explanation to your customers.  Please explain the following questions based on the following contract(s) listed under your name:   CURRENT TOKEN ADDRESS ACCORDING TO YOU WEBSITE/SALES PORTAL PAGE:    Address public wallet = 0xE3bf6F453e85B57cdDfF2030BAcf119841d132D5  Address Information  Address              0xE3bf6F453e85B57cdDfF2030BAcf119841d132D5 Balance SALES      $ 3.2273 Total In ETH      0.006514604 ETHER  TOTAL TOKENS SO FAR:   111.16739995  Token Balances  ZNAQ AVAILABLE 19,999,888.832600005 ZNAQ    OTHER CONTRACTS FOUND UNDER THE NAME ZNAQ : 0xe898ed8b6118b11968f27329f25e04454c3ca8f2    ON YOUR WEBSITE SALES GRAPHIC/CHART show a value SALES of 836,253 USD  – Can you please explain:  On Ethplorer and also on Etherscan you just had 6 transactions (including contract creation)  - since the beginning of the creation of your contract you just had the total sales of  $ 3.2412 Dollars (0.00651460 ETH),    Can you provide records to prove this total sales of 836,253 USD?  Because we found only less than $ 4 dollars in sales.   Also you have a chart that demonstrates how much you sold in other other coins  Please provide wallet address to confirm transactions and values of your claim  DETAILED STATISTICS (from your web site) TOTAL   $ 836 253    Bitcoin                 61.6317 BTC    Bitcoin Cash         85.1942 BCH    Ethereum               537.9954 ETH    Ripple                              XRP    Thank you very much and please answer those questions since your numbers doesn’t make sense to investors because we cant find records of your sales or funds.  Thank you  ICOEthics Team  Images  Graphic Sales on your web site:   http://www.icoethics.com/imgs/znaq/znaq%20sales%20web%20site%20main%20page.JPG  Other wallets (must provide number):   http://www.icoethics.com/imgs/znaq/sales%20value%20znaq.JPG  Wallet on ethxplore:   http://www.icoethics.com/imgs/znaq/ZENAC%20walle1t.JPG  Wallet on Etherscan: http://www.icoethics.com/imgs/znaq/ZENAC%20wallet.JPG  Second wallet found: http://www.icoethics.com/imgs/znaq/ZENAC%20wallet2.JPG  Contract address: http://www.icoethics.com/imgs/znaq/zenaq%20contract%20address.JPG  Token holders:   http://www.icoethics.com/imgs/znaq/znaq%20ttoken%20holder.JPG

Author: ZNAQ Index
Title: [ANN][PRE SALE] ZNAQ: First crypto index traded as a token! 3200% last year!
Body: WEBSITE  l WHITEPAPER  l ONEPAGER  l  PRESENTATION  REFERRAL PROGRAM l  BOUNTY PROGRAM  TWITTER  l  FACEBOOK  l  TELEGRAM  l  REDDIT  l  YOUTUBE  l  INSTAGRAM    What is ZNAQ?  ZNAQ is the first crypto index traded as a token. ZNAQ Index reflects cryptocurrency market capitalization. It gives you possibility to invest in the whole cryptocurrency market with only one token.  ZNAQ Exchange – An official exchange platform for trading ZNAQ Tokens. It supports 20 different currencies and provides users with a safe and easy way to trade.  Where to use ZNAQ token?  ZNAQ Cryptex - allows to trade different cryptocurrency pairs, indices and other trading products in the form of a Futures Contract with a leverage of up to 100x.  ZNAQ Analytics -  provides technical analysis, forecasts and reports, community discussion rooms and a unique platform for assembling and analyzing multi-currency portfolios.   ZNAQ Token Pre-Sale: Phase Two dates are July 01, 2018 - July 31, 2018.     ZNAQ Token Sale dates are August 01, 2018 - August 31, 2018.
